attributes.action: Make it easier for 14 year olds and older to get a job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Im a 15 Year old boy who has wanted a job for about 1 year and a half but unable to get one due to law stating you have to be 16 to get a job.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions already in exsistence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/jobs-under16/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
